file_content.text: May the Force be with you, my friend.
Good to see you again. Incredible. You actually went through the ruins?
Here it is--the history of the Jedi on Taris. Artifacts I don't even recognize. Exactly what we need to rebuild the order.
Wonderful.
You don't know what this means. I'll get them back to the Masters unharmed, I swear.
Thanks to my work.
I'm not one to argue. I couldn't have done it.
I'll remember your help here. Thank you, my friend--thank you.
That's it?
It's a good deed done. But I can... compensate you somehow, if you like.
Thank you, my friend. Thank you. And may the Force be with you.
The Jedi Enclave may be long gone, but we can hope they left something behind.
You're a Jedi! It's--I didn't know anyone else was out here.
I'm Devon Race, lady. I have permission from Master Silvarte to be on Taris--exploratory mission to the old Jedi Enclave.
I'm Devon Race, sir. I have permission from Master Silvarte to be on Taris--exploratory mission to the old Jedi Enclave.
Officer! I'm--it's good to see someone else out here.
Stand your ground! You're... hired help, with the reconstruction? Not a scavenger, I take it.
I'm Devon Race. The Jedi Masters gave me permission to come planetside--exploratory mission to the old Jedi Enclave.
I haven't heard anything about a "Jedi Enclave."
Jedi Enclave?
You look hurt.
I'm a little scraped up, but I can keep going. I have a mission.
Look at you. I'm surprised a Master would let you wipe your own nose.
Stupid kid.
Look at you. I'm surprised a Jedi would let you wipe your own nose.
Stupid kid.
Begging your pardon, I've nearly finished my training.
Centuries back, the Jedi had an outpost on Taris. They left shortly before the world burned--I'm here to recover anything left behind.
But between the fauna and the looters, I haven't had much luck. We were hoping for holocrons, diaries--Jedi history! In truth, we knew it was a long shot.
If you didn't think you'd find anything, why bother?
So why come here?
With the order in disarray and the Coruscant temple lost, we need to tap every resource we can find. We're building a future.
Let me join the search.
Perhaps. I am a bit... overwhelmed, and we need to find everything we can to help build a future for the order.
So who do you think will get you first? The rakghouls or the pirates?
You're in over your head.
I don't intend to die. Look, if you want to help, help. If you want to leave, leave.
Master Silvarte warned me that any artifacts left behind would be hidden. Protected. Sealed in ferrocrete pillars or disguised as statues.
Our tools are lightsabers and blasters. If you can cut away the outer layers, find anything from the enclave in these ruins... bring it to me. I'd be grateful.
Excuse me. There are... creatures out there, and now really isn't a good time.
